item.description:
Books

 

The address and directions will be emailed out Saturday, Septembe 1st.

1. Date: Saturday, November 10th at 5pm

2. Location: Sarah's house in Raymond

Address & directions will be emailed out Saturday, October 6th.

3. Host: Sarah

4. Theme: Books

Please bring a copy of your favorite book,  bring a food dish associated with that book, and a copy of the recipe to share. Please be sure to post the name of the book AND the food item you will be bringing. To sign up for an item, please post a comment at the bottom of this page. Also, please be specific about what you will be bringing so we don't have duplicates. Thank you!

1. The Hunger Games - Bread - Sarah

2. The Night Circus - Chocolate mice, caramel popcorn, or something to that effect - Rebecca

3. Polar Express - Hot Chocolate - Amber

4. The Pilot's Wife - Pigs in a Blanket - Lauren

5. Under the Tuscan Sun - Fried Artichokes - Lisa K

6. The Athena Project - Bloody Mary Kabobs - Stacy

7. Secret Life of Bees - Honey Cake - Kelly

8. The Help - Waldorf Salad - Wendy

9. Lady Chatterly's Lover - Mac & Cheese - Heather

10. French Apple Tart - Tiffany

11. Eat, Pray, Love - Gelato - Sarah

12.

13.

14.

15.

16.

17.

18.

19.

20. Plates, napkins, and utensils


ALL MEETUPS Policy
Please remember, RSVP yes only if you plan to attend an event to allow us to plan accordingly. If you RSVP yes and change your mind on attending, you MUST provide at least 24 hours notice or you will be considered a "No Show". After 5 "No Shows", you will no longer be able to attend meetup events.
item.name: Girls Night! Theme: Books
